name: Hustler Kush
description: Hustler Kush is an indica-dominant hybrid bred by Greenworks out of Seattle, WA. These potent buds offer a sweet, earthy, piney aroma with fast-acting and long-lasting effects optimal for pain relief.
descriptionPlain: Hustler Kush is an indica-dominant hybrid bred by Greenworks out of Seattle, WA. These potent buds offer a sweet, earthy, piney aroma with fast-acting and long-lasting effects optimal for pain relief.

highlightedReviews.text:
Frosty green and orange hairs oh my! Not a particularly heavy hitter but this has a nice flow feeling to it. Steady building high that doesn't creep up on you so much as transforms itself into Matthew Mcconaughey. Your body feels pretty alright, you yourself will feel alright. Everything is just alright man. It won't get you a commercial and a fancy car but this stuff really fits the mellow bill and no worries attitude you may find yourself in need of. 

Really helpful with pain as well. I'd pinched a nerve in my back and after a bowl of this. Well yeah. Everything was just alright and I was very happy to be me and enjoying life in that moment.
one of the best strains ive ever had

articles.title: New Strains Alert: La Niña, Sugar Punch, Hustler Kush, Ortega, and Monster Cookies
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The Leafly strain Explorer is expanding quickly, thanks to your suggestions and feedback! Check out this week's new indica, sativa, and hybrid additions: La Niña, Sugar Punch, Hustler Kush, Ortega, and Monster Cookies.
Visit their strain pages to write a review or to find availability near you!
   La Niña
Characteristics of La Niña:

75/25 sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Haze and White Widow
Breeder: Mr. Nice Seeds
Sweet, fruity aroma
Clear, functional effects
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 10 weeks

 
   Hustler Kush
Characteristics of Hustler Kush:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Breeder: Greenworks (Seattle, WA).
Sweet, earthy, piney aroma
Fast-acting and long-lasting effects

   Monster Cookies
Characteristics of Monster Cookies:

80/20 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) and Granddaddy Purple
Earthy, grape, and berry aroma
Delivers a jarring dose of euphoria with full-body relaxation to follow

   Sugar Punch
Characteristics of Sugar Punch:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Super Silver Haze and The One
Breeder: Sannie Seeds
Sweet, berry, and lemon aroma
Sedating, dreamy effects
Indoor flowering time of 9 to 10 weeks

   Ortega
Characteristics of Ortega:

Mostly indica 
Bred from Northern Lights genetics
Sweet, earthy aroma
Heavily tranquilizing
Indoor flowering time of 6 to 8 weeks
